body_text:
What anime name are these two characters lying in the grass from? I have been searching this name for weeks!!
Could you help me out?

What anime are these two students spread out on the ground from? 
boy and girl laying on the ground next to each other. I think I know the anime but can't remember it, I want to know the name of the anime.
